tasks.title: Develop Personalized Greeting Function
tasks.description: Create a function that accepts a name as input and returns a personalized greeting. The function should handle typical edge cases, such as empty strings or non-string inputs, gracefully.
tasks.technical_notes: Consider using string formatting techniques to insert the name into the greeting message. Ensure the function is well-documented and includes unit tests to verify its correctness.

tasks.title: Setup Project Structure
tasks.description: Initialize the project with proper folder structure, documentation, and Docker setup.
tasks.technical_notes: Base structure for multi-agent development system.
